turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I just saw a new Starbucks coffee that looks amazing. Can you order me one for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you can tell me all about it. Which Starbucks should I use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it the one at 2431 East North St. I have to be over that way in about 20 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I have their number. What's the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's a Cordusio.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds yummy. You want your regular venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, make it a tall. I want to sample first.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok tall it is. What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make is soy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it extra hot

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK extra hot, tall Cordusio. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think it has some sort of topping.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I'm on their site and it has a cocoa powdered topping.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Any sugar?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep, has sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ask them to hold the topping.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, no topping

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks for doing that. I'll let you know how it tastes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I just sent the order to head on over there. And tell me about it when you get back in the office. Bye
